name: Moon Juice
description:
You're in. 

Getting into Moon Juice Production Facility 2A was a long-shot to begin with. But now you're in, and you're not gonna waste the opportunity to wipe that vile substance off the face of the Earth. 

Deactivate the five terminals that control the facility's thermal regulator. Cause a meltdown. It's a kamikaze mission, but if no more kids get hooked on Moon Juice, it will all have been worth it. Just be careful not to take too much yourself; once you've had a taste, it can bring out the beast within...

Moon Juice is a sneaky werewolf action game. Traverse an expansive military-science facility while being hunted by sophisticated enemies. Transform between human and wolf forms to sneak around them - or meet them head on if you're up for a fight.

Controls

Move: WASD / left stick

Interact: right click / south button

Transform: space / north button

Attack (when transformed): left click / west button
